entity.aicompanion.companion.teleport.re: You're too far. Want me to teleport to you? Reply within %s seconds.
Distance is too big. Should I teleport to you? %s seconds left.
Reminder: I can teleport to you. Want me to? %s seconds left.
entity.aicompanion.companion.spawn.about: I can gather and bring resources on request.
entity.aicompanion.companion.mode.stop: Got it. Stopping here. To follow again, type "FOLLOWING".
entity.aicompanion.companion.chat.defaul: I'm listening. What do you need?
entity.aicompanion.companion.hit.3: Do that again and I'll drop you, fucker.
entity.aicompanion.companion.hit.4: I'm helping you, not your damn punching bag.
entity.aicompanion.companion.hit.5: Ow, that hurt, what the hell are you doing?!
entity.aicompanion.companion.hit.7: I do not like this, seriously.
entity.aicompanion.companion.hit.8: Stop it, I'm not a mannequin.
entity.aicompanion.companion.hit.11: One more time and I hit back.
entity.aicompanion.companion.hit.12: Are you completely fucked in the head?
entity.aicompanion.companion.hit.16: Are you out of your fucking mind?
entity.aicompanion.companion.hit.19: One more hit and that's it.
entity.aicompanion.companion.hit.25: This will end badly for you.
entity.aicompanion.companion.hit.30: One more time and you're fucked.
entity.aicompanion.companion.hit.33: I was helping you, you know.
entity.aicompanion.companion.hit.40: Last time I'm saying it - stop.
Tell the lava to go fuck itself.
Hot as hell and just as stupid.
I'm burning, fuck. This is the end.
Lava is the worst thing that could happen.
Did you seriously let me fall in there?
Why did I even go there?
I didn't think it would end like this.
What a stupid way to die.
This is the end of my story.
I didn't get to say anything.
Smeared on the ground. Gravity can fuck off.
Next time don't let me jump off a cliff.
I was falling and knew it was over.
The ground was closer than I thought.
Well, that's what I get for flying.
I knew this would end badly.
I didn't have time to brace.
I should not have climbed up there.
I fell and that was it.
entity.aicompanion.companion.death.gener: Well, I'm dead. Great fucking job.
Dying like this is total bullshit.
You were supposed to keep me alive. You fucked it up.
So this is how it ends.
I didn't make it in time.
I'm no longer in this world.
entity.aicompanion.companion.chest.reque: My inventory is full. Place a chest, aim at it, and type "here is your chest".
entity.aicompanion.companion.chest.found: Got it. I'll use this chest for storage.
entity.aicompanion.companion.chest.assig: You're not looking at a chest. Aim at it and type "here is your chest".
entity.aicompanion.companion.chest.alrea: A chest is already assigned at XYZ: %s %s %s
entity.aicompanion.companion.chest.lost: I can't find my chest anymore, so I forgot it.
entity.aicompanion.companion.gather.miss: I can't find that resource nearby.
entity.aicompanion.companion.gather.fail: Sorry, I couldn't mine it. Try again or in another spot.
entity.aicompanion.companion.home.look_d: Look at the top of the block to set home.
entity.aicompanion.companion.home.confir: Home is far away, %s. Teleport home? %s seconds left.
entity.aicompanion.companion.home.follow: I'm home. Click "FOLLOW" or type "FOLLOWING". %s seconds left.
entity.aicompanion.companion.home.assess: This command only works inside a building.
Too early to reassess the house. Wait %s min %s sec.
Nothing changed in the house; I already provided an assessment.
Report was truncated due to scan limits.
I checked this room. Is this the whole house or are there more rooms?
I already checked this room. Lead me to another one and type "another room".
Please send this room name in one message first.
I already recorded a room with this name. Please name it differently.
I am already assessing the house. Lead me to the next room and type "another room".
Lead me to the next room and type "another room".
entity.aicompanion.companion.home.set.co: You can change home again in %sm %ss.
I'm not dead permanently. Set home with /ainpc sethome so I know where to respawn.
entity.aicompanion.companion.owner.death: You died at: X=%s Y=%s Z=%s. I'm already nearby.
entity.aicompanion.companion.where.statu: I'm at XYZ: %s %s %s. Teleport me to you? %s seconds left.
entity.aicompanion.companion.boat.reques: You're in a boat. Can I sit with you? %s seconds left.
entity.aicompanion.companion.dimension.r: You're in another dimension. Should I move to you? %s seconds left.
entity.aicompanion.companion.help.genera: Features: resource gathering, torches, inventory, home, where NPC, AI chat. Commands: "help mining", "help inventory", "help home", "help where npc", "help ai".
entity.aicompanion.companion.help.chest: To assign a chest: 1) place a chest, 2) aim at it, 3) type "here is your chest". Without aiming I won't accept it. Only one chest is allowed; you can't reassign it.
entity.aicompanion.companion.help.home: Home: /ainpc sethome and "go home". If home is far, I will ask for confirmation.
entity.aicompanion.companion.help.invent: Inventory: open with /ainpc inv, chat message "inventory" (single word only), or double SHIFT+RMB on NPC. It is a regular 36-slot inventory titled nekostulAI. Food is stored only in the food slot, and tools/armor only in the equipment panel (/ainpc gui). I do not pick up normal player drops into this inventory; I only accept food and one tool per dedicated slot.
entity.aicompanion.companion.help.mining: Mining: you can set a task sequence. Examples: "first mine 10 dirt, then 4 logs" or "mine 10 dirt and 4 logs". Tasks run strictly in order, and I drop gathered items only after the whole sequence is done. If one task fails, I report the reason and stop the sequence.
entity.aicompanion.companion.help.where: "Where are you" shows my coordinates and a teleport button. Cooldown is 5 minutes.
entity.aicompanion.companion.help.ai: AI chat: type "ai <your question>" or "ии <your question>". Configure in config/aicompanion-common.toml: ai.yandexgpt.enabled, ai.yandexgpt.apiKey, ai.yandexgpt.folderId, ai.yandexgpt.model.
entity.aicompanion.companion.inventory.d: My inventory is quite full. Drop everything?
Tools remain in the panel, and I still have food. Click "Drop" to drop food; the button is active for %s seconds.
entity.aicompanion.companion.inventory.r: I have nothing to give back; my inventory is empty.
entity.aicompanion.companion.tree.harves: Sorry, I couldn`t get that tree. If you want, tell me to try again or we can look in another spot.
I can't find any trees nearby. Try another spot.
Can`t chop trees in a village. Let�s go outside and continue.
Sorry, I couldn't gather it. I can try again (%s sec).
entity.aicompanion.bugreport.cooldown: Please wait %sm %ss before the next bug report.
entity.aicompanion.companion.food.need: I need food. Bring me something to eat.
entity.aicompanion.companion.food.low_he: I'm badly hurt and need help.
entity.aicompanion.companion.tool.sugges: I can mine without an axe, but it will be faster with one.
I can dig without a shovel, but it will be faster with one.
I can mine without a pickaxe, but it will be faster with one.
entity.aicompanion.companion.tool.requir: I need a pickaxe to mine stone.
I need %s and %s to craft torches.
I need %s to craft torches; I already have sticks.
I need %s to craft torches; I already have coal.
entity.aicompanion.companion.torch.ready: I'll make the torches and bring them.
entity.aicompanion.companion.ore.require: I need at least a stone pickaxe to mine this ore.
I need at least an iron pickaxe to mine this ore.
entity.aicompanion.companion.ai.empty_pr: Type a question after "ai" so I can send it to YandexGPT.
entity.aicompanion.companion.ai.wait: Please wait, I'm still processing your previous AI request.
entity.aicompanion.companion.ai.disabled: AI chat is disabled in config (ai.yandexgpt.enabled=false).
entity.aicompanion.companion.ai.not_conf: AI is not configured: set ai.yandexgpt.apiKey and ai.yandexgpt.folderId in config/aicompanion-common.toml.
entity.aicompanion.companion.ai.daily_li: Daily AI limit reached. Requests remaining today: %s.
entity.aicompanion.companion.ai.failed: Failed to get a response from YandexGPT. Try again later.
I couldn't understand the command. Please specify what resource and amount to gather or bring.

Failed to get the final house review from AI. Try finishing the inspection again.
entity.aicompanion.companion.build.in_pr: I am already building a house. Wait for the current build to finish.

You need to look at a block where the build should start.
Got it, preparing a house plan via AI...

House is built, but I had to skip %s block(s): the space was occupied.

Okay, I will wait for resources. Once I have everything, I will continue building.
I can't gather this by myself: %s.
entity.aicompanion.companion.build.gathe: I couldn't gather the needed materials for construction. I need your help with resources.
